abstract: Editorial urges Congress to vote to repeal the 1996 Defense of Marriage Act, which bars the federal government from recognizing lawfully performed marriages between same-sex couples.
snippet: The Senate Judiciary Committee took a step toward equality by planning a vote on whether to repeal the federal law that bars recognition of same-sex marriages.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: The Senate Judiciary Committee took a step toward equality by planning a vote on whether to repeal the federal law that bars recognition of same-sex marriages.
